Defined by the admin implementation logic can be made an active implementation logic only after Zero Trust Period allows.   github.com   ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-3561.md --- eip: 3561 title: Trust Minimized Upgradeability Proxy description: proxy with a delay before specified upgrade goes live author: Sam Porter (@SamPorter1984) discussions-to: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/trust-minimized-proxy/5742 status: Review type: Standards Track category: ERC created: 2021-05-09 ---  ## Abstract  Removing trust from upgradeability proxy is necessary for anonymous developers. In order to accomplish this, instant and potentially malicious upgrades must be prevented. This EIP introduces additional storage slots for upgradeability proxy which are assumed to decrease trust in interaction with upgradeable smart contracts. Defined by the admin implementation logic can be made an active implementation logic only after Zero Trust Period allows.  ## Motivation  Anonymous developers who utilize upgradeability proxies typically struggle to earn the trust of the community.
